name: American soldier
description:
This is a work of art from the "Before, War, After" collection, which was exhibited in 2011 at the Museum of Contemporary Art in Geneva, Switzerland. Actual size: 60 x 45 cm and digital size: 3060 x 3676 , oil on canvas.
Why war?
War... War... Who was the individual who first raised his/her voice and shouted with wrath and used it to exercise violence and spark a war? And in the future of human civilization, will we still hear the sound of these violent and aggressive voices.
